long_desc.thetext:
On http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/about/careers.html#feature-first-person you can find that Aza Raskin's image is at the very bottom right of the pane.
I guess that's not intended behaviour?

Hey John - what type of images do we want to show in these shots - past and present employees & contributors, or just current employees meaning we should remove past employees?
Cc-ing Morgamic as I know he has a special love for the careers section of the site.

Yeah, the larger issue here is that this content needs a refresh - Aza isn't the only ex-employee in our careers section.
We do need to update the content on this page in general, though. Laura - thoughts on an upcoming release we could fit this into? It might take a bit longer than a usual page update b/c we'll also need to work with the recruiting team on content direction.
